snippet: Ahead of a U.N. commission report, the Israeli military issued an update on its internal inquiries, saying neither Israeli nor international laws were broken in several deadly clashes.
abstract: Israel issues report saying no laws were broken by military during 2014 conflict in Gaza.

byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: Ahead of a U.N. commission report, the Israeli military issued an update on its internal inquiries, saying neither Israeli nor international laws were broken in several deadly clashes.

headline.main: Israeli Report Backs Tactics by Military in Gaza War
headline.print_headline: Israeli Report Backs Tactics by Military in Gaza War

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
